name: Tiny Tree Socks
full_text: This pattern is FREE! Want to receive special discount codes and be the first to know about new pattern releases? Sign up for my newsletter here! Instagram Website YouTube THE TINY TREE SOCKS ARE A QUICK, FESTIVE KNIT FOR THE SOCK OBSESSED! Fiber enthusiasts who want their holiday decor to reflect their knitting addiction will delight in whipping up these colorful little socks to hang on the tree, or string into a garland for the mantle! Instructions are included for two different heels: the Afterthought and the traditional Heel Flap and Gusset. I’ve included a tutorial for the afterthought in case you’re new to this particular technique. Additionally, a colorwork chart is included if you want to add a little flair to your tiny socks! I hope you enjoy knitting these as much as I did! Make sure to include the hashtag #tinytreesocks on social media so I can see and share all your beautiful, festive little socks! MATERIALS * Approximately 26 yards of fingering weight yarn US Size 1 (2.25mm) knitting needles A tapestry needle for weaving in ends
